overview:
Lee is the founder and CEO of Who@. Over 20 years of experience in the technology and investment industries at companies like Dell (badge #244) where he was their 2nd ex-pat and worked in Dell Germany for 2 years and Oracle, where he left as a practice director in the high tech consulting group.

His first company, ServiceLane, was funded by Austin Ventures, Fremont Ventures and Silicon Valley Bank. He sold it to Owens Corning (NYSE: OC) in December of 2000. In 2005 he conceived of the business model and co-founded Annandale Capital, an investment advisor managing just under $500 million in institutional and private client assets.

Who@ is a mobile centric app that helps professionals and the companies they work for maximize the value of their relationships in a unique and private way.

We believe the most valuable social graph is in the smart phone of professionals and the company’s Exchange Server. We’ve built a platform we call Relationships as a Service to not only keep those contacts up to date, but enables you to leverage the people you know and trust, while never exposing anything confidential that would put you in an uncomfortable situation
